response.original_title: 雀鬼/裏麻雀勝負！20年間無敗の男 [後編]
response.overview: The year is 1977, in Kabukicho, Shinjuku. Shoichi Sakurai, a professional underground mahjong player, has come to be known as the "Juku Mahjong Demon." One day, he is asked to play mahjong on behalf of a yakuza boss who is looking after him. However, the person he is playing against turns out to be a big shot known as the "Emperor of Ginza."
response.tagline: Underground Mahjong Battle! The Man Undefeated for 20 Years [Part 2]
response.title: Janki: Secret Mahjong Battle! The Man Undefeated for 20 Years PART 2
